Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: I am a researcher in science and mathematics education. My special interest areas include graphicacy and the use of graphs, as well as the history and philosophy of science. My work includes developing educational activities involving graphs and the handling of real-world data. I enjoy exploring the use of technology to design and change learning experiences in science and mathematics. In CLIx, I am also a part of the Mathematics team.
Team_detail_math.education: Ph.D. current, Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research. Designing learning contexts for graphicacy in science education. M.Sc (2005), Department of Physics, University of Pune. Physics B.Sc (2001), Fergusson College, Pune. Physics

Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: I have been working in the field of education for the past 9 years, engaging with both- the students and teachers. My primary responsibilities in CLIx are developing content for Mathematics modules, designing professional development courses for teachers and conducting workshops for teachers. Research in the areas of students’ learning and classroom interactions were some of my other focus areas in CLIx. I have previously worked with Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education, TIFR, Mumbai and Azim Premji Foundation, Bangalore.
Team_detail_math.education: M.A. Elementary Education (2017), Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai.M.Sc. Physics (2008), University of Mumbai.

Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: I have taught Mathematics at the undergraduate level in Patna University for 5 years (2002-2007), during which period I was a member of the Mathematics focus group of the Bihar Curriculum Framework 2006 for school education. I was also part of the Bihar Governor’s Core Committee for recommending and rejuvenating higher education in Bihar. In CLIx, I oversee Mathematics Team’s overall task domain including module vision and creation, teachers’ professional development workshops and module implementation. My key interests include sociology of (mathematics) education, language diversity and math learning, and ethnomathematics.
Team_detail_math.education: Post Doc (2016), University of South Africa (UNISA), South Africa Ph.D. (2015), Mathematics Education, HBCSE, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR) Deemed University MSc (2002), Mathematics, University of Pune BSc (1999), Mathematics (Honours), Patna University

Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: I have been engaged with Mathematics education and Cognitive Science research work for more than 5 years now. My Ph.D. work is on students’ conceptions of area measurement. As a Senior Research Associate within the CLIx Mathematics team, I was involved in developing content, doing field trials, supporting the teacher training, facilitating the implementation of modules, collecting and analyzing field data and writing research reports for the same.
Team_detail_math.education: Ph.D. (pursuing), Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research. Mathematics Education and Cognition.M. Sc (2009), Bengal Engineering and Science University, Shibpur. Applied Mathematics. B. Sc (2007), University of North Bengal. Mathematics.

Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: I have been working in education for 6 years now. As part of the TFI fellowship, I taught primary grade students in a Municipal Corporation school in Delhi. I worked in the Teacher Education space with APF, Uttarakhand, designing curriculum and engagements. At CLIx, I am involved with the design and development of secondary level Mathematics content for ICT based student learning modules and online Teacher Professional Development courses. My interest areas are instructional design, ICT for Mathematics learning, Math Education Research and Teacher Professional Development.
Team_detail_math.education: M.A. Education (Elementary) (pursuing), Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai M.Sc. (Tech.) Information Systems (2011), Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

Team_detail_math.jobTitleName: Ex-Team Lead (till Dec 2016) & Adjunct Associate Professor
Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: In the three decades spent in the field of Education, I have been a Mathematics Teacher, Assessment Expert, Curriculum Designer, and Teacher Educator. Prior to CLIx, as Vice President, at Educational Initiatives Pvt. Ltd., I conceptualized and created Mindspark, India’s first Digital Adaptive Learning program. I also designed the Mathematics Pedagogy course for Azim Premji University’s B.Sc-B.Ed program, and have been associated with various projects at UNICEF and NCERT, among others. At CLIx, I initially led Mathematics curriculum design, and later, research related to the implementation of the modules. My main interest now is to improve access to education, especially through innovative digital technologies.
Team_detail_math.education: B.Ed (1987), Central Institute of Education (CIE), Delhi University.B.Sc (1986), Mathematics (Hons), St. Stephen’s College, Delhi University.

Team_detail_math.jobTitleName: Ex- Research Assistant (2017-2019), Centre for Education
Team_detail_math.employeeDetails: I had been working on the development of the content as well as browser-based interactive tools for maths modules. I have also been involved in training and mentoring learners from different backgrounds and communities for the usage of open-source technologies in their daily lives. My area of interest lies between various areas in Mathematics and computer science, especially graph theory and computational geometry. I am also a keen explorer of various programming styles and different technologies and its usage in STEM education.
Team_detail_math.education: M.Sc (2017), Department of Computer Science, University of Mumbai B.E (2014), Department of Instrumentation Engineering, Watumull Institute of Electrical Engineering and Computer Technology, Mumbai

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I have worked as a teacher, teacher educator and curriculum designer in the public and private sector over the last few years. Prior to CLIx, I worked with St. Andrew’s College, Muktangan (NGO), consulted with TISS-NUSSD and Tata Trusts. I serve as an honorary board member for Sharon Education Society, Mumbai.
Team_detail_science.education: Ph.D. current, Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research. Designing learning contexts for graphicacy in science education. M.Sc (2005), Department of Physics, University of Pune. Physics B.Sc (2001), Fergusson College, Pune. Physics

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I began my career as a journalist, covering education in The Hindu from 2010 to 2012. Subsequently, I worked on curriculum development with the NGO Selco Foundation and on documenting practices with another NGO, Vidya Mytri trust. At CLIx, I am part of the English team and involved in curriculum development and research.
Team_detail_science.education: M.A. Elementary Education (2017), Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai.M.Sc. Physics (2008), University of Mumbai.

Team_detail_science.jobTitleName: Assistant Professor, English Language and Literature, CEIAR, TISS, Mumbai
Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I have served as Visiting Faculty in the English department at Stella Maris College, Chennai and at St. Xavier’s College, Mumbai. I have previously been a Teaching Assistant in English at IIT Bombay and have nearly six years’ experience in teaching English language and literature to students of engineering, arts and the sciences. I enjoy research in art and aesthetic theories, the postmodernist historical novel, culture and representation studies and humanities education
Team_detail_science.education: Post Doc (2016), University of South Africa (UNISA), South Africa Ph.D. (2015), Mathematics Education, HBCSE, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR) Deemed University MSc (2002), Mathematics, University of Pune BSc (1999), Mathematics (Honours), Patna University

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: As a freelance English Language Trainer, I have conducted spoken English workshops, taught English for the IELTS exams and have been a  visiting faculty teaching English to undergraduate B.C.A students. My experience includes three years of teaching English to primary school children in Zilla Parishad schools as part of my work as a teacher and teacher trainer with  a Navi Mumbai based NGO, Manjari Charitable Trust. As Sr. Research Associate with CLIx, my interests include curriculum design and research analysis.
Team_detail_science.education: Ph.D. (pursuing), Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research. Mathematics Education and Cognition.M. Sc (2009), Bengal Engineering and Science University, Shibpur. Applied Mathematics. B. Sc (2007), University of North Bengal. Mathematics.

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I work as a  Research Associate at CLIx. As a part of the English Team, I am involved in content development and research related activities. I have previously worked as a primary school teacher at Shikshantar school, Gurgaon for two years; post which I worked with InOpen Technologies, an IIT Bombay incubation, as an Education Development Manager, for a year.
Team_detail_science.education: M.A. Education (Elementary) (pursuing), Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai M.Sc. (Tech.) Information Systems (2011), Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I have worked as a Research Associate, Lecturer and Assistant Professor in the areas of English language and Language Communication, over the last few years. Before joining CLIx, I have worked with Sardar Patel College of Engineering and with two academic research projects: Indo Canadian Studies Centre (Mumbai University) and CoHaB (Mumbai University).
Team_detail_science.education: B.Ed (1987), Central Institute of Education (CIE), Delhi University.B.Sc (1986), Mathematics (Hons), St. Stephen’s College, Delhi University.

Team_detail_science.jobTitleName: Ex- Research Assistant (2017-2019), Centre for Education
Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I had been working on the development of the content as well as browser-based interactive tools for maths modules. My area of interest lies between various areas in Mathematics and computer science, especially graph theory and computational geometry. I am also a keen explorer of various programming styles and different technologies and its usage in STEM education.

Team_detail_science.education: B.Ed (1987), Central Institute of Education (CIE), Delhi University.B.Sc (1986), Mathematics (Hons), St. Stephen’s College, Delhi University.

Team_detail_science.jobTitleName: Ex- Research Assistant (2017-2019), Centre for Education
Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I had been working on the development of the content as well as browser-based interactive tools for maths modules. I have also been involved in training and mentoring learners from different backgrounds and communities for the usage of open-source technologies in their daily lives. My area of interest lies between various areas in Mathematics and computer science, especially graph theory and computational geometry. I am also a keen explorer of various programming styles and different technologies and its usage in STEM education.
Team_detail_science.education: M.Sc (2017), Department of Computer Science, University of Mumbai B.E (2014), Department of Instrumentation Engineering, Watumull Institute of Electrical Engineering and Computer Technology, Mumbai

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I began my career as a journalist, covering education in The Hindu from 2010 to 2012. Subsequently, I worked on curriculum development with the NGO Selco Foundation and on documenting practices with another NGO, Vidya Mytri trust. At CLIx, I am part of the English team and involved in curriculum development and research.
Team_detail_science.education: M.A. Elementary Education (2017), Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai.M.Sc. Physics (2008), University of Mumbai.

Team_detail_science.jobTitleName: Assistant Professor, English Language and Literature, CEIAR, TISS, Mumbai
Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I have served as Visiting Faculty in the English department at Stella Maris College, Chennai and at St. Xavier’s College, Mumbai. I have previously been a Teaching Assistant in English at IIT Bombay and have nearly six years’ experience in teaching English language and literature to students of engineering, arts and the sciences. I enjoy research in art and aesthetic theories, the postmodernist historical novel, culture and representation studies and humanities education
Team_detail_science.education: Post Doc (2016), University of South Africa (UNISA), South Africa Ph.D. (2015), Mathematics Education, HBCSE, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR) Deemed University MSc (2002), Mathematics, University of Pune BSc (1999), Mathematics (Honours), Patna University

Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: As a freelance English Language Trainer, I have conducted spoken English workshops, taught English for the IELTS exams and have been a  visiting faculty teaching English to undergraduate B.C.A students. My experience includes three years of teaching English to primary school children in Zilla Parishad schools as part of my work as a teacher and teacher trainer with  a Navi Mumbai based NGO, Manjari Charitable Trust. As Sr. Research Associate with CLIx, my interests include curriculum design and research analysis.
Team_detail_science.education: Ph.D. (pursuing), Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research. Mathematics Education and Cognition.M. Sc (2009), Bengal Engineering and Science University, Shibpur. Applied Mathematics. B. Sc (2007), University of North Bengal. Mathematics.

Team_detail_science.userId: i, Shrey Pareek, Praveen Alamsetti, Jayashree Ramadas, Ankush (HBCSE), Dr. Ramani Atkuri and Dr. Sumit Roy.
Team_detail_science.employeeDetails: I work as a  Research Associate at CLIx. As a part of the English Team, I am involved in content development and research related activities. I have previously worked as a primary school teacher at Shikshantar school, Gurgaon for two years; post which I worked with InOpen Technologies, an IIT Bombay incubation, as an Education Development Manager, for a year.
Team_detail_science.education: M.A. Education (Elementary) (pursuing), Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai M.Sc. (Tech.) Information Systems (2011), Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani
